snippet: For top golfers trying to stay at their best, the grind of a packed tour calendar can be the greatest hazard of all.
abstract: Karen Crouse On Golf column observes that for top golfers trying to stay at their best, the grind of a packed tour calendar can be the greatest hazard of all; notes several players, like Phil Mickelson and Rory McIlroy who are taking some time off before the United States Open.
lead_paragraph: For top golfers trying to stay at their best, the grind of a packed tour calendar can be the greatest hazard of all.

headline.seo: Top Golfers Fight Fatigue by Pausing Between Tournaments
headline.main: Pausing Between Shots, Just to Regroup
headline.print_headline: Pausing Between Shots, Just to Regroup
